snippet: The bodies were discovered during a rescue operation by the Italian Navy. Some 60,000 people have reached Italian shores this year from North Africa.
abstract: Italian naval personnel discover bodies of about 30 migrants in hold of fishing boat during rescue operation off coast of Sicily; officers rescue 566 people from vessel during operation.
lead_paragraph: The bodies were discovered during a rescue operation by the Italian Navy. Some 60,000 people have reached Italian shores this year from North Africa.

headline.main: 30 Migrants Found Dead in a Boat Near Sicily
headline.print_headline: 30 Migrants Found Dead in a Boat Near Sicily
